markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 630 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the conjuration school of magic, typically involving [summoning](/Traits.aspx?ID=154), creation, [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156), or moving things from place to place.
name: Conjuration
